statements: SELECT * FROM unified_view;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name FROM unified_view WHERE age > 30;
SELECT last_name, first_name, age FROM unified_view ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM unified_view WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM unified_view WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM unified_view WHERE age >= 25 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name FROM unified_view WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40;
SELECT id, first_name, age FROM unified_view WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM unified_view WHERE first_name='John' OR last_name='Doe' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, last_name, age FROM unified_view WHERE first_name='Alice' AND age < 30;
SELECT * FROM datasets
SELECT name, source FROM datasets
SELECT id, type, created_at FROM visualizations
SELECT id, dataset_id, type, created_at FROM visualizations ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM datasets WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM datasets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, source FROM datasets WHERE id > 2 AND source = 'Internal';
SELECT id, type, created_at FROM visualizations WHERE type IN ('Chart', 'Graph') ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT datasets.name, visualizations.type FROM datasets JOIN visualizations ON datasets.id = visualizations.dataset_id;
SELECT datasets.id, datasets.name, visualizations.type FROM datasets LEFT JOIN visualizations ON datasets.id = visualizations.dataset_id WHERE visualizations.created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM unified_datasets;
SELECT dataset_name, source FROM unified_datasets WHERE dataset_id = 1;
SELECT dataset_name, created_date FROM unified_datasets WHERE created_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT dataset_name FROM unified_datasets WHERE source = 'external';
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM data_sources;
SELECT dataset_name, source FROM unified_datasets WHERE created_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT dataset_name, source FROM unified_datasets WHERE source = 'Internal' ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT dataset_name, source, created_date FROM unified_datasets WHERE dataset_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY created_date;
SELECT d.dataset_name, v.analysis_type, v.analysis_result FROM unified_datasets d JOIN visual_analysis v ON d.dataset_id = v.dataset_id WHERE v.analysis_type = 'Regression';
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM data_sources ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM unified_view LIMIT 10;
SELECT dataset_id, data_type, data_value FROM unified_view WHERE id = 5;
SELECT source_id, source_name FROM sources;
SELECT dataset_name, dataset_type FROM datasets WHERE dataset_id = 2;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_result FROM visual_analysis;
SELECT * FROM unified_view WHERE data_type = 'temperature';
SELECT dataset_name, source_name FROM datasets JOIN sources ON datasets.source_id = sources.source_id WHERE dataset_type = 'sales';
SELECT dataset_name, data_type, data_value FROM unified_view WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT source_name, COUNT(analysis_id) AS analysis_count FROM sources LEFT JOIN visual_analysis ON sources.source_id = visual_analysis.source_id GROUP BY source_name HAVING COUNT(analysis_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM unified_view WHERE dataset_id IN (SELECT dataset_id FROM datasets WHERE dataset_type = 'marketing') ORDER BY data_value;
SELECT * FROM dataset_A;
SELECT name, age FROM dataset_A ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT course, grade FROM dataset_B WHERE grade >= 80;
SELECT department, manager FROM dataset_C WHERE manager = 'John Doe';
SELECT location, revenue FROM dataset_D WHERE revenue < 100000;
SELECT id, name, age FROM dataset_A WHERE age > 30
SELECT id, course, grade FROM dataset_B WHERE grade >= 90
SELECT id, department, manager FROM dataset_C WHERE manager LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT id, location, revenue FROM dataset_D ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT id, category, quantity FROM dataset_E WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100
